content: beret pour chats by ediblewishez12 on ravelry 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn 1 ch5 skip 1st chain sc3 in final st of chain hdc10 10 push the cabillou sticky uppy bit upward to the right side so it will not interfere with your next round place a marker in the last stitch before and after folding the cabillou up 2 slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet of last round working past the cabillou ch1 half_double_crochet increase in each st around 20 3 slip_stitch ch1 *half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase* repeat * to * until end of round 30 4 slip_stitch ch1 hdc2 increase ch11 skip 5 sts half_double_crochet increase *hdc2 half_double_crochet increase* repeat * to * once more hdc2 ch11 skip 5 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase repeat * to * twice 49 5 slip_stitch ch1 bphdc4 hdc11 in back bumps of chain bphdc12 hdc11 in back bumps of chain bphdc11 49 6 slip_stitch ch1 *hdc2 half_double_crochet decrease* repeat * to * until one stitch remains half_double_crochet in last stitch slip_stitch fasten o� and weave in your ends now go torture i mean flatter your kitties with a photoshoot
